data_table.name: GOKIND_NIDDK_Phenotype
data_table.study_name: Search for Susceptibility Genes for Diabetic Nephropathy in Type 1 Diabetes (GoKinD study participants and parents), NIDDK

variable.description: External patient ID (masked family ID) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: EXTIDPAT
Accession number barcode - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_BARCOD
Current eligibility family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRELIG
Current trio family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRTRIO
T_FAMID2 masked, external family ID - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T_FAMID2
SITEJORG Joslin or GW or qc (j, g, q) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SITEJORG
T_N_KID # proband/sib records/family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T_N_KID
X_ID_REL ID relative - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_ID_REL
Proband or sibling (Y/N) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PROBAND
RASS proband (Y/N) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_RASSPR
Participant's gender - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SEX
Age at entry (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AGE
Predominant race/ethnicity - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: RACE

stats.enum: American Indian or Alaskan Native American
American Indian or Alaskan Native American
American Indian or Alaskan Native American

variable.description: Eligibility/trio status - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ELIGTRIO
Renal function status - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: RENALST
End-stage renal disease (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ESRD
Did proband have a pancreas transplant? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PANCR
Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 1st urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR1
Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 2nd urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR2
Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 3rd urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR3
Abnormal creatinine (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ABCREATN
Serum creatinine (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CREATN
Serum cystatin (mg/L) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CYSTATIN
Serum lipid cholesterol (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CHOLSTR
Serum lipid HDL (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HDL
Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c; %) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HBA1C
Glomerular filtration rate 1 (GFR1; MDRD [Modification of Diet in Renal Disease, see Levey et al., 1999, PMID: 10075613] ) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR1
Glomerular filtration rate 2 (GFR2; Cockcroft-Gault; ml/min) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR2
Glomerular filtration rate 3 (GFR3; 1/Serum Creatinine; dL/mg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR3
Body Mass Index (kg/m²) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: BMI
Natural waist circumference (cm) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: WAIST
Is proband a current smoker? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRSMK
Has proband ever smoked? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: EVERSMK
Is proband diabetic? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABETES
Is proband diabetic? If yes, has he/she been diagnosed with type 1 or type 2 diabetes? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T1T2DIA
Is proband taking insulin? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSULIN
Is proband taking insulin? If yes, what is the insulin regimen? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSREGMN
Is proband taking insulin? If yes, what is the insulin dosage per kg body weight? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSDOSG
Is proband diabetic? If yes, since how long? (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABDUR
Is proband taking angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACE
Is proband taking anti-hypertensive drugs? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ANTH
Is proband taking lipid lowering medication? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: LIP
Systolic blood pressure (mmHg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SYSBP
Diastolic blood pressure (mmHg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABP
Does proband have a history of hypertension? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HYPERTEN
Does proband have a history of cardiovascular complication(s)? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CARDIOV
Does proband have a history of peripheral vascular complication(s)? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PERIPHV
Does proband have a history of gangrene? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GANGREN
Does proband have a history of non-traumatic amputation? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AMPUTATN
Does proband have a history of neuropathy due to diabetes? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: NEURP
Does proband have a history of focal laser treatment? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: FLASER
Does proband have a history of pan-retinal laser treatment? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PLASER
Does proband have a history of auto-immune disease? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AUTOIMMU
Time between diagnosis of type 1 diabetes (T1D) and kidney complications (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: TIMEEVNT
